title: Stand-Bot
subtitle: Product Design
greetingText: Stand-Bot is a bot that helps you run stand-up meetings in Slack, and keep a record of your past stand-ups.
detailsTitle: A bot on your team’s side
detailsText:
Be with a remote team can imply to work on a different time zone, and the stand-up meetings can be on a inadequate time, or doesn’t keep a record of the sessions. Those are the main reasons we decided to build a bot that helps teams to organize better their meeting without any friction.

While doing some research with users, we gather some feedback and features that user wanted, mainly they find really useful to keep track of their stand-up to see the evolution of their projects.
contributionList: Mockup design: provide the Invision prototype and Sketch files
